title: Hélène Périvier
text:
I am a researcher in economics in the OFCE at Sciences Po Paris. I am the director of the Academic and Research Program on Gender Studies of Sciences Po, PRESAGE.
I am expert member in the HCFEA, high council for families.
I am co-editor of the « Domaine Genre » at the Presses de Sciences Po
Member of the executive committee of La Cité du Genre, Université Paris Cité.
My research focuses on gender economics, with a specific interest in evaluations of social and family policies, on gender inequalities and discriminations in the labour market, in higher education and within family.

New!
